: : Darkangel : :

Darkangel landed and listened to Tyrael's explination. He then took 
flight again, but hung in the back.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Tyrael: Land. Now!
> 
> He softly brushes the dusty ground and transforms and lands.
> 
> Tyrael: Let me explain. We were grossly outnumbered, it seems as 
> though Both Kaiser and Dragoon were left back to base and, even if 
we 
> did fight like demons, we were going to be crushed sooner or later. 
I 
> would rather have had Hydras out of my way than have him here 
against 
> me! Now, with this truce, we might have a chance to dull his senses 
> and strike him bad. Back to base now!
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Assassin" <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > : : Darkangel : :
> > 
> > Darkangel looked visably uneasy while saying this.
> > 
> > Darkangel: To be honest, sir, the thought crossed my cpu. I have 
> > always understood your tactics and stood with you, but this, I 
dont 
> > understand this.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > They were far away from the base of their new allies when 
> > Dreaplague 
> > > raised her voice.
> > > 
> > > Dread: So father, why those sudden suggestions? 
> > > 
> > > Tyrael looked at her with the darkest blue gaze he could 
muster. 
> > The 
> > > daughter suddenly lost any mockery in her voice.
> > > 
> > > Tyrael: You wonder, do you? What about you, Darkangel? Do you 
> > wonder 
> > > why I called for a truce? D0o you think I am weak? Or crazy?
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Assassin" <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > > : : Darkangel : :
> > > > 
> > > > Darkangel shakes his head, not liking the latest turn of 
> events. 
> > He 
> > > > leaps up, flying off with the Tripredacus. Darkangel remains 
in 
> > > robot 
> > > > mode, do to his injuries.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> 
wrote:
> > > > > Tyrael: of course! For now though, we shall go back to 
base. 
> > > Let's 
> > > > > deal with them later! Tripredacus (his voice become harsh 
and 
> > > > angry) 
> > > > > back to base now!
> > > > > 
> > > > > He transforms to phoenix mode and flies away. Dreadplague, 
> > > > intrigued, 
> > > > > changes to chopper and follows her father.
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> 
> > wrote:
> > > > > > Hydras:
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > "Then we can use her wife to caught him, she's under my 
> > > absolute 
> > > > > > control, after all we can enjoy his torture"replied 
> > Hydras"ANy 
> > > > one 
> > > > > > have seen, BlackStorm???"asked the Male to his troops"yah

> > > > > that 
> > > > > > winged cat."
